messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] round earth
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Jill, Thanks! Great site - my ability to answer all those 10pm questions was almost at its limit!! Thank goodness for Jeeves (as Bertie Wooster used to
messages.messageBody:
Hi Jill,
Thanks! Great site - my ability to answer all those 10pm questions was
almost at its limit!! Thank goodness for Jeeves (as Bertie Wooster used to
say!!)
Jessica says "hi!" back - hope Ellen has started saving her allowance for
the plane fare to New Zealand LOL


Namaste
Brooke

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] round earth
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Brooke, the reason the earth is round is gravity. For more info go to www.askjeeves.com  and type in the question.. why is the earth round?  lots of info
messages.messageBody:
Hi Brooke, the reason the earth is round is gravity.
For more info go to www.askjeeves.com and type in the
question.. why is the earth round? lots of info
there! good luck have fun and hugs to Jessica from
Ellen!
Jill
